title: BRIEF-Apiam Animal Health Announces Acquisition Of ACE Laboratory Services
text:
BRIEF-Apiam Animal Health Announces Acquisition Of ACE Laboratory Services

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Sep 03, 2019 08:50)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Apiam Animal Health Announces Acquisition Of ACE Laboratory Services Sept 3 (Reuters) - Apiam Animal Health Ltd : * ANNOUNCES ACQUISITION OF SPECIALIST PRODUCTION ANIMAL SERVICES PROVIDER, ACE LABORATORY SERVICES * AGREED TO BUY 100% OF ISSUED SHARES OF ACE LABORATORY SERVICES FOR TOTAL CONSIDERATION OF $16 MILLION * EPS ACCRETIVE FOR APIAM SHAREHOLDERS IN FIRST FULL YEAR OF OWNERSHIP * CO EXPECTS NO CHANGES TO PERSONNEL STRUCTURE OF ACE LABORATORY SERVICES

BRIEF-Apiam Animal Health Announces Acquisition Of ACE Laboratory Services
description: BRIEF-Apiam Animal Health Announces Acquisition Of ACE Laboratory Services
